name: Language Trainers
description: Offers in-person and online Armenian classes with qualified native tutors. They have tutors available in Pittsburgh and Philadelphia, and their online services can cater to students anywhere in Pennsylvania. They emphasize personalized courses tailored to individual needs
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation

name: Listen & Learn
description: Provides Armenian courses in Philadelphia, both in-person and online. They offer one-on-one lessons and small group classes, with native speaker tutors. Their online options can serve the entire state of Pennsylvania
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation

name: AVC (Armenian Virtual College)
description: Offers online Armenian language courses, including Eastern and Western Armenian. They provide a structured curriculum with multimedia features and have an app for smartphones and tablets. While not specific to Pennsylvania, their online nature makes them accessible to residents
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation

name: Tun Online Armenian School
description: Delivers Eastern and Western Armenian lessons online via a web app, offering flexibility for learners to log in and study at their convenience. They offer various masterclass series for different aspects of the language
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation

name: Outschool (Teni - Let's Speak Armenian!)
description: Features individual tutors like Teni who offer private, one-on-one conversational Armenian tutoring online. Teni has an average rating of 5.0/5 stars based on 51 reviews. These services are accessible virtually to students in Pennsylvania
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation

name: Preply
description: A large online platform where you can find numerous Armenian tutors. As of the search, there were 35 Armenian teachers with an average rating of 4.96/5 stars from 545 customers. Tutors like Argishti and Tatevik are listed, offering personalized lessons
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation

name: Verbling
description: Connects students with qualified, native-speaking Armenian teachers for online lessons. Tutors such as Hasmik H. and Astghik R. are available, with Astghik R. having a 5.0/5 rating based on 59 reviews
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation

name: Superprof
description: Offers a platform to find Armenian tutors, with many providing online classes. Lessons start from $15 per hour, and tutors are reviewed by students. While specific addresses are not applicable for online tutors, the service is available to Pennsylvania residents
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation

name: Armenia Distance Learning
description: Provides virtual tutoring support with tutors from Armenia who teach various subjects and languages, including Armenian. They highlight experienced teachers like Asriyan Gayane and Baghdasaryan Alina
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation

name: Apprentus
description: Lists online Armenian tutors and teachers for private classes. It mentions tutors like Nazik (rated 5/5 stars) and Sarkis, offering lessons in Armenian language, grammar, literature, and history
services: Armenian-speaking Virtual tutoring in Pennsylvania consultation
